name: bin
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool credit_card_bin_checker_validator.
Tool description: Credit Card BIN Checker/Validator consists of 900,000 BINs worldwide that allows you to quickly and easily check the Bank Identification Number (BIN) of a credit or debit card. With just 6, 8 or 9 BIN length (depending on the bank), you can integrate the API into your website or application to verify card information and prevent fraudulent transactions.
API description: Queries the BIN (Bank Identification Number) information using the Toolbench RapidAPI.

bin.description: The BIN (Bank Identification Number) to be checked.
